title: snowflake.core.pipe.PipeResource | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Bases: SchemaObjectReferenceMixin[PipeCollection]
Represents a reference to a Snowflake pipe.

With this pipe reference, you can fetch information about pipes, as well
as perform certain actions on them.
Attributes
Methods
Drop this pipe.

if_exists (bool, optional) – Check the existence of this pipe before dropping it.
Default is None, which is equivalent to False.

Refresh this pipe.

if_exists (bool, optional) – Check the existence of this pipe before refreshing it.
Default is None, which is equivalent to False.
prefix (str, optional) – Path (or prefix) appended to the stage reference in the pipe definition.

modified_after (datetime, optional) – Timestamp (in ISO-8601 format) of the oldest data files to copy into the Snowpipe ingest queue based on
the LAST_MODIFIED date (i.e. date when a file was staged).
